Shown is the "trans-cranial-electra process" used by the communists for brainwashing.
Villains are Ho-Tong (introduced and dies here) and Chinese Communists; also introduced is Madame Chi-Ling.
Data from Gene Reed via Grand Comic Book Database.

117.title: Transdimensional Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
117.author: written by Erick Wujcik ; editor, Alex Marciniszyn ; interior artist, James Lawson.
notes: At head of title: Palladium Books presents.
Spine title: Transdimensional TMNT.
Compatible with Heroes Unlimited, Ninjas & Superspies, and other Palladium RPG's.
